text: The Spit could be: *Southport Spit, Queensland, a permanent sand spit that separates the Southport Broadwater from the Pacific Ocean *The Spit, New South Wales, an urban locality in the suburb of Mosman, New South Wales *Leslie Street Spit, a man-made peninsula in Toronto, Canada *Revenge of the Spit, a Ras Kass mixtape *The Spits, a Seattle based punk musical group *The Spitting Image, a 1998 book by Vietnam veteran Jerry Lembcke == See also == *Spit (disambiguation)
title: The Spit
